thread.title: Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery

title: Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery
text:
Updated: 2:56 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 | Posted: 2:55 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery Sponsored Links The Associated Press LOS ANGELES â€” 
Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian have decided to stay married as the former NBA star continues his recovery a week after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. 
Kardashian's lawyer, Laura Wasser, went before a Los Angeles judge Wednesday to withdraw divorce papers filed in December 2013. The judge granted the request. 
The one-page document signed by Odom and Kardashian was submitted without prejudice, which means it can be refiled at later date. 
Kardashian has been by Odom's side since he was found in extremely critical condition Oct. 13 at the Love Ranch brothel in the rural community of Crystal, Nevada. He regained consciousness Friday and was transported to Los Angeles on Monday to recover. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WHIO-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
